segments.text: I see the woman so absorbed in her task, so oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how the chaos behind her goes unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so engrossed in their cookie heist; itâ€™s like watching a heist film unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart racing as the boy stretches further, almost tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to overflow, and I cringe at the thought of it damaging the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me is rooting for the boy to get his cookie, yet another part fears for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the sunlight highlighting the ordinary scene, yet it feels anything but normal.
segments.speaker: PAR
